description: This file defines a REST controller class in a Java Spring Boot application for handling utility payment operations, including retrieving payment data and processing new payments.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentController
classes.description: Controller class for utility payment API endpoints, managing HTTP requests related to utility payments.

methods.name: readPayments
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a paginated list of utility payments.

methods.name: processPayment
methods.description: Handles POST requests to process a new utility payment.
